physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a bird\u0027s-eye view of Singapore Harbour and the roads adjacent to it. There are numerous boats in the harbour
 as well as bigger ships further in the background. There are a number of vehicles
 such as cars
 trucks
 and motorcycles
 which are parked or in operation.

metadata.title_text: Harbour Area, Singapore Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a bird's-eye view of Singapore Harbour and the roads adjacent to it. There are numerous boats in the harbour, as well as bigger ships further in the background. There are a number of vehicles, such as cars, trucks, and motorcycles, which are parked or in operation.
